review_title: Zolene Restaurant: Rented The hidden treasure I found in Ikoyi, Lagos.
review_text: The rainbow rice and salad was a perfect blend of fresh flavors plus the ambiance at Zolene is amazing.
Never had a more divine food experience. The stir fried rice was its own journey and the sauteed goat meat has the best texture I've ever had.
I loved the food and the ambience of the restaurant. Would definitely recommend this restaurant, itâ€™s a nice place to hangout with friends
